main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported in Macon and Forsyth, Georgia on August 6, 1959.
interesting points: The first sighting was described as a blob of light that turned silver metallic and elongated, The object was noted to have no human features or sound, Some witnesses reported a larger-than-average saucer shape, Several witnesses included a civilian and a police officer, The investigation was unable to find any aircraft in the area.
sighted object: a silver metallic object changing shape
witness description: four civilians and a police officer, one male civilian in particular was approximately 30 years old, around 5'10" tall, and had whitish hair
